nodes.text: Dan Hennessey (born August 25, 1941) is a Canadian voice actor who played Jord Dusat, Uncle Gundy, Jyn Obah, Vinga, and Yorpa on Star Wars Droids; and King Gorneesh on Ewoks.

His other voice credits include Inspector Gadget, The Raccoons, Police Academy, Dinosaucers, The Adventures of Tintin, Care Bears, and the Nelvana animated feature Rock and Rule. He has also doubled as voice director for many series, including Beetlejuice and X-Men.
